org.gephi.graph.api

Interface TextData


  • public interface TextData
    Contains all extended data related to text display.
    Author:
    Mathieu Bastian

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      float getAlpha()
      Returns alpha color value (transparency) of the text.
      float getB()
      Get blue component of the text color.
      float getG()
      Get green component of the text color.
      float getHeight()
      Returns text height
      float getR()
      Get red component of the text color.
      float getSize()
      Returns text size
      String getText()
      Returns the text String
      float getWidth()
      Returns text width
      boolean isVisible()
      Returns visibility of the text
      void setColor(Color color)
      Sets text color
      void setColor(float r, float g, float b, float alpha)
      Sets all color components for the text.
      void setSize(float size)
      Sets text size
      void setText(String text)
      Sets the text String
      void setVisible(boolean visible)
      Sets visible state of the text

      • getSize

        float getSize()
        Returns text size
        Returns:
        Text size

      • getR

        float getR()
        Get red component of the text color. Value ranges from 0.0 to 1.0
        Returns:
        Red color component

      • getG

        float getG()
        Get green component of the text color. Value ranges from 0.0 to 1.0
        Returns:
        Green color component

      • getB

        float getB()
        Get blue component of the text color. Value ranges from 0.0 to 1.0
        Returns:
        Blue color component

      • getAlpha

        float getAlpha()
        Returns alpha color value (transparency) of the text. Value ranges from 0.0 to 1.0
        Returns:
        Alpha (transparency)

      • isVisible

        boolean isVisible()
        Returns visibility of the text
        Returns:
        True if visible, false otherwise

      • setText

        void setText(String text)
        Sets the text String
        Parameters:
        text - Text String

      • setColor

        void setColor(float r,
            float g,
            float b,
            float alpha)
        Sets all color components for the text. All values should be between 0.0 and 1.0
        Parameters:
        r - Red color component
        g - Green color component
        b - Blue color component
        alpha - Alpha (transparency)

      • setColor

        void setColor(Color color)
        Sets text color
        Parameters:
        color - Text color

      • setSize

        void setSize(float size)
        Sets text size
        Parameters:
        size - Text size

      • setVisible

        void setVisible(boolean visible)
        Sets visible state of the text
        Parameters:
        visible - Text visibility
